titleStmt.title: William Godwin's Diary
titleStmt.author: William Godwin
titleStmt.funder: Leverhulme Foundation and the John Fell OUP Research Fund

publicationStmt.authority: Published by the Godwin Diary Project, University of Oxford

revisionDesc.change: Dr James Cummings generated this file.

div.ab:
1814. Jan. 1. Sa. Write to Miller A S , & Day. Call on Panton
,
Lett
&
Hamond
: seek Rayre . Hamond calls.

Jan. 2. Su. Expect Gell : call on Place
: Lambs sup. Raised from great depression, by F P .

3. M. Write to Patrickson . Call on Price
, Macmillan ,
Hume
&
Knowles
: seek Rayre : Gell calls n .

4. Tu. G Write to Day , & Miller, Perth
: Drayton, Mortimer, st. 35. Gell , & Jones, Size Lane , call: call on Taylor (Gray’s Inn)
, Ellis (Museum) &
Place
.

5. W. Write to Greenhill . Barons’ Wars, C. I. Call on Rayre
,
Mills
,
Jeffery
,
Thane
,
Bentham
,
Sutherland
,
Haughton
&
Knowles
: meet capt. Curran : M dines: Hogan & R Morrel at tea. Seek Spackmn
& Segur
.

6. Th. Write to Rayre . Call on Place
& Hume : Perry engr calls: Hogan at tea.

7. F. Barons’ Wars, 1/2 C. II: Mornay, çala. Call on Egerton
, Price &
Perry engr
: Hamond dines; adv. Perry
: H Robinson calls.

8. Sa. Barons’ War, C. II. Call on Cherry
: Booth dines: John Evans (Bristol) au soir.

Jan. 9. M.
Barons’ Wars, 1/2 C. III: Mornay, p. 22. Booth dines; adv. Hamond, Waller, & Evans (Bristol)
: call on Place
.

10. Tu.
Baron’s Wars, C. III. Call on Howard (w. Hayward),
Hume
,
Knowles
,
Place twice, &
Cobbet
: Gell & Booth calln : Hamond at tea: Sutton calls. Write to Miller A S .

11. W .
Barons’ Wars, 1/2 C. IV: Mornay, p. 43. Call on Davison
: Faulder atty
& Hogan call: Booth dines.

12. Th.
Mornay, c. 7: Astrophel, çala. Call on Gell
,
Price
&
Davison
: Booth , W Curran , Lambert , Gell & Hamond call.

13. F .
Barons’ Wars, C. IV, V: 1/3 Edward II. Call on Price
: seek King : Hamond calls: Booth dines.

14. F. Barons’ Wars, 1/2 C. VI. Faithful & Faulder atty call: call on King
,
Price
&
Hayward
n : Booth at tea.

15. Sa. Barons’ Wars, fin. Call on Place
: Booth calls.

Jan. 16. Su. Drayton, Ep. 1, 2: Mornay, c. 11, 12. Call on Perry
: Booth dines.

17. M. Drayton, Ep. 3. Call on King
,
Sutherland
,
Curtis
&
Hume
: Booth, L Kenney & Hogan at tea.

18. Tu. Drayton, Ep. 4, 5: Mornay, c. 13. Call on Davison
,
Price
, Taylor (Gray’s Inn)
,
Hume
,
Perry
&
Place
.

19. W. Drayton, Ep. 6. Call on Jas White
: seek Ballachey : Hamond calls: Booth dines: Rylance calls.

20. Th. Write to C C, Harwich
. Drayton, Ep. 7. Meet Nicholson : call on Place
: M dines.

21. F. Write to Shelley , & C C, Landguard Fort
. Drayton, Ep. 8. Call on
Ballachey
: seek Buxton : Booth & Hamond call. News of S. leaving London .

22. Sa. Write to Shelley . Call on Curtis
,
Davison
,
Hazard
,
White
&
R Taylor
: seek Price : Gill & R Taylor call: theatre, w. M J & W, Coriolanus: C C at home; adv. Booth
. adv. W Curran & Steele
.

Jan. 23. Su.
Shelley expected: Booth dines; adv. Lambs
.

24. M. Call on Price
&
Ballachey
: Hogan , Faulder atty
, Ridgway jr
, M & L K call, & Jo G : Kenney dines: call on
Place
: meet Newton & Shelley .

25. Tu. Drayton, Ep. 13, 14. Letter to Taylor, Norwich
. M & Perry artist call: call on King (Adephi)
&
Hume
.

26. W. Call on Davison twice,
Critchit
,
Theobald
,
Ward
&
Middleton
, &
bill-brokers
: Booth dines: Gill calls.

27. Th. Write to Taylor (Norwich)
, Shelley & Day . Call on Davison
, &
Sutherland , w. M J & Perry : Hamond & Hogan call: call on Dufour , w. Gill, M Lamb (adv. M Burney
) &
Emly
n .

28. F. Patronage, p. 210. Call on Rickm[ans
n?] &
Knapton bbs,
R Sharp
, &
Crosby
n : Perry artist & R Crosby call.

29. Sa. Patronage, p. 418. Call on Price
, Ballachey & Sweetman.

Jan. 30. Su. Patronage, Vol. II, p. 76. Call on Plce
, w. C C : S E dines; invités Kennies, Currans & Hamond
.

31. M. Patronage, p. 144. Pay Mackintosh . Call on Middleton
&
Ballachey
: M calls: Hogan at tea; adv. H Robinson
.

Feb. 1. Th. Letter from Rickman . Call, w. C C, on
Orme
,
Law
,
Cradock
&
Curtis
, & on
Place
: Gill , Freeman & Faulder call: theatre, Farmer’s Wife.

2. W. Call on Curtis
& Place , & (w. C C) on Hailes
&
Adams (Colburn)
: meet J Taylor & Hazlit .

3. Th. Write to Rickman . Patronage, p. 318. Call on
Ballachey
n &
Sweetman
: seek Buxton : Sutton & son call: sup at Kenney’s , w. M J, F, C & J .
4. F. Patronage, p. 431; Vol. III, p. 46. Hamond calls: walk on the Thames.

5. Sa. Letter to Shelley . Patronage, p. 402.
Lamb, 39
M Lamb, 51

Feb. 6. Su. Advertisements, &c. Patronage, Vol. IV, p. 80. Call on
Place
: W & A Curran at tea; invités Hamond & Place
.
7. M. Patronage, p. 212. Call on Mackintosh & Place : Hamond calls, & Northcote n .

8. Tu. Write to Shelley . Religio Medici, p. 63: Patronage, p. 388, fin. Call on Ballachey
: Gill calls.

9. W. Write to Evans , Camberwel . Mornay, c. 14. Call on Buxton
: Hogan calls.
10. Th. Write for M . Bradley (on Harrison ), Gill & Hamond call: M dines.

11. F. Holyday, çala. Call on Evans
&
Hume
: M Jones & Lobrot call: L Kenney dines. Call on Curtis
: Hogan calls.
12. Sa. Holyday, çala: Cibber, p. 44. Letter from Shelley : dine at Mackintosh’s , w. Jno Wedgwood & son, & miss Allens .

Feb. 13. Su. Cibber, p. 62. Call on Evans
, & for C C , on Place
: dine at Hume’s , w. Newland & C C : call, w. do , on Mulready
.

14. M. Write to Mackintosh . Call on Callon
&
Hayward
: seek Phipps, Albion
:
Jefferson
& M call: meet Gen. White .

15. Th. Cibber, p. 118.Call on Ballachey
,
Hume
&
Place
n: Jas White n
& Gill call:
meet Liston .

16. W. Cibber, p. 150: Mar-all, acts 1, 2, 3. Mrs Topping calls: call on Place
&
Longdil
: sup at Lb’s , w. mesds Reynolds & Hazlit, M J, C C, F & J. Persius, Sat. V, 44.

17. Th. Cibber, p. 218: Mar-all, fin.
Gen. White calls, & Hamond : call on Hayward
: Hogan at tea.

18. F. Phaer, B. I. M Burney at tea; adv. Dawe & A Curran, & Gen. White
.

19. Sa. Cibber, p. 258. Call on Shelley
,
Place
&
Hume
{.}
Theatre, Kean in Richard; w. M J
.
Feb. 20. Su. Dryden, K Arthur, &c: Cibber, p. 291. Gen. White, W & A Curran at tea.

21. M. Gen. White, 4 pp. M & Gen. White call, Gill & miss Green, Southampton Row
.

22. Tu. Revenger’s Tragedy, act 1. Call on
Hill
,
Ballachey
,
Burton
&
Place
:
Hume calls: meet Randolph .

23. W. Revenger, act 2, 3: Mornay, c. 15: Cibber, p. 335. Call on
Hayward
,
Ballachey
,
Peele’s
,
Hume
&
Place
n : Macmillan calls. adv. Springal .

24. Th. Golding, çala: Cibber, p. 432. Call on Hayward
: A Curran calls: M dines.
25. F. Revenger, acts 4, 5: Cibber, p. 488.

26. Sa. 1/2 Poetaster: Plutarch, Life of Brutus. Gill , Hamond & Kenney call.
Fell dies.

Feb. 27. Su. Plutarch, Antony, p. 13; On Superstition, çala: Poetaster, act 3. Call on Place
: tea Collier’s , w. A Robinsons, H Robinson, Tomlines, F, C & J .

28. M. Montaigne, çala.
Place
,
Wakefield
,
Hogan
&
M call: A Curran at tea.
Mar. 1. Tu. Write to Gen White . Antony, p. 38, fin.; Cato, p. 7: Montaigne, çala. M dines: Hogan at tea.

2. W. Write to King, &c. Cato, p. 21. Gen White calls: call on
Place
.

3. Th. Montaigne, III, 12. Place , Wakefield , Hamond , Gill , M & Gen White n call: call on Burton , w. Place ,
M
&
Ballachey
:
N G calls, £3860 .

4. F.
Auction . Write to Shelley . Meet M & C C : M dines; adv. Hogan
: call on Place
&
Rodd
. Seneca, Ep. 15: Phaer, çala.

5. Sa. Write to Shelley . Call on Ballachey
,
Burton
n &
Poole , w. C C : OBrien , M , Gill & Hogan call.

Mar. 6. Su. Phaer, 1/2 B. II: Mornay, c. 15. Call on Place
: L Dibbin calls: W & A Curran, H Robinson, & Lambs sup.

7. M. Write to H Hamond , &
West-Grinstead
. Shelley dines; adv. M
.

8. Tu.
Gill calls: call, w. Shelley, on Ballachey
:
Shelley breakfasts & dines .

9. W. Write to Shelley . Phaer, B. II. W Curran , Hogan , Gill & M call: call on
Hume (adv. Faithful ) &
Place
.

10. Th. Send to Hamond : call on Place
: M dines.

11. F.
Hamond & M call: call (après diner) on Hill ; adv. Dubois & Barnes
: Hogan sups; adv. H Robinson
. Deliquium.

12. Sa. Write to Constable . Kenney dines; adv. Lamb & Hogan
. Newton calls.
Mar. 13. Su. Phaer, 1/2 B. III: Mornay, 1/2 c. 16. Call on Place , w. C C . Pantheon, 1 1/2 pp.

14. M.
Freeman, engr
, Hookham , M & Hogan n call: call on Odel
: Write to Shelley . Walter (Ts) calls: meet S Fell .

15. Tu. Proteus, 1/2 page. Write to Baxter
. Montaigne, p. 14.
16. W. Pantheon, p. 2. Write to Mary . Montaigne, p. 33.
17. Th. Phaer, B. III. Freeman , miss Sands , M , Hogan , A Curran , S Taylor call: call on Dawe , w. A C : miss Green calls n .

18. F. Write to Shelley & Lambert . M from Ballachey , Davison & R Sharp
: Hogan calls: sup at
Aldis’s , w.M J, Walshes & mrs Edwin .
19. Sa. Write to Place . Theatre, Hamlet. Hogan calls.

Mar. 20. Su. Phaer, B. IV. Call on Dawe
&
Place , w. C C .

21. M. Call on Lambert
&
Place
: R Taylor , Jo G , miss Sands & Freeman call: Hogan sups. adv. J Richter .

22. Tu.
Call, w. Shelley , at Doctors Commons
, & on Haughton
: M dines, from Teasdale
: Hogan calls. call on
Rodd ; adv. Bramston
.

23. W.
Shelley calls, writes for shooting : call at Praed’s
: Gill calls.

24. Th. Phaer, 1/2 B. V. Call on Hume
: Kenney dines; adv. Hogan
. Montaigne, p. 72.

25. F. Montaigne, p. 100. Call on Lackington ; adv. Orme
: Hogan calls; & M from Teasdale
: Jas Smith calls.

26. Sa. Phaer, B. V: Seven Champions, p. 37. Call on Jas White
,
Jo G
n ,
Knowles
,
Macmillan
,
Hume
n &
Place
n .

Mar. 27. Su. Champions, p. 54. Call on Place
: Poole at tea. G Brodie, from W Dawson , calls.

28. M. Montaigne, p. 116. Call on Ballachey
: Hogan, M & R Morrel dine; adv. F Walsh & D Lamb
.

29. Tu. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. Montaigne, p. 142. Call on
Hume
, &
Ballachey (Saunders): M & Hogan call.

30. W. Write to Shelley . Phaer, 1/2 B. VI. Seek Ridgway (Devon H) & Place : call on Haughton
&
Rodd
: meet Carlisle &
Murray
: A Curran calls. M W G at supper.

31. Th. Write to Shelley & Sands . Call on Place
,
Mackintosh
,
Brandram
&
Ballachey
: M dines. Write to D. of Devon . Surrender of Paris .

Apr. 1. F. Write to Shelley . Call on Mackintosh
&
Place
: M calls.

2. Sa.
Williams (Tanyralt) calls: call on Ballachey
: Jo G calls.
Napoleon deposed.

Apr. 3. Su. Dine at S E’s , w.M J, F, C, M, J & W; adv. Cordry
: Brodie calls.
4. M. Write to Rickman .

5. Tu. Write to Gen. White . Hogan calls twice, &
M : call on Ballachey
n &
Hume
. Write to H Rogers . Gill calls.

6. W. Write to Sands . Call on Place
,
Haughton
&
Hayward
: Hayward calls. Meet W Wilson .

7. Th.
Hayward & M call: call on
Place
&
Bridger
.

8. F. Write to H Hamond & Mackintosh . Call, w. C C, on
Mackintosh
n , Devon n (Chiswick)
& C L Moody
.

9. Sa. Write to Shelley . Call on Ballachey
&
Rodd ; adv. Triphook
: S E calls: M Jones dines.
Apr. 10. Su. Cato, p. 31. Dine at Hume’s , w. Haydn Corri, Cole, miss Dawe, mrs Hazlit, C & M; adv. mrs Thomson & Newland .

11. M. Phaer, 1/2 B. VII. Hume calls: call on
Northcote
&
Place
: Illuminations.

12. Tu. Cato, fin. Call on Place
&
Mackintosh
n : Gill calls n . Call on Knowles
.

13. W. Write to Sands & Patrickson . Mackintosh to Heaton . Call on Place
n . Coeur de Lion, pts 1, 2, 3. K Owen calls.

14. Th. Phaer, B. VII: Coeur de Lion, pts 4, 5. Mrs & S Topping , & Gill call: call on Mackintosh
n .
15. F. Coeur de Lion, pt 6: Wanderer, p. 120. Hogan calls.
16. Sa. Write to Shelley . Wanderer, p. 324. Call on Place twice: M Burney & Coates calln .

Apr. 17. Su. Marston, çala: Wanderer, p. 443; Vol. II, p. 142. Call on Aldis
.

18. M. Wanderer, p. 458; Vol. III, p. 58.
W Curran calls.

19. Tu. Phaer, 1/2 B. VIII: Wanderer, p. 270. Call on Mackintosh
, &
Place ; adv. Wakefield
: meet Peter Smith & H Richter .

20. W. Wanderer, p. 438. Write to Mackintosh . Call on Heaton
,
Mackintosh
&
Place
:
theatre, Debtor & Creditor; adv. Lambs, Hazlits, M Burney, F Ht, mrs Ayrton, & Currans; w. M J
: meet C L Moody

21. Th. Write to Mackintosh & Macmillan . Wanderer, Vol. IV, p. 359; Vol. V, p. 92.
R Taylor calls.

22. F. Coeur de Lion, pt 7: Wanderer, p. 276. Letter from Mackintosh : call on Ballachey
: letter from Ballachey . Hogan sups. Macmillan calls. Write to M .

23. Sa. Write to Shelley . Wanderer, p. 395, fin. Call on Ballachey : Hogan at tea. Constable ,
Fleming
& Brodie call.

Apr. 24. Su. Coer de Lion, p. 8: Faustus, fin: Lust’s Dominion, acts 1, 2, 3. Call on Place
.

25. M. Phaer, B. VIII: Coer de Lion, pt 9: Lust’s Dominion, fin. Call on Ballachey
,
Amory
& Russel, C H
: Hookham & Hogan call.

26. Tu. Call on Longdil
n ,
Lett
&
Ballachey
: Brodie dines.

27. W. Coer de Lion, p. 10. Call on Lett
: clerk from Teasdale calls . Mornay, c. 16.

28. Th. Call on Longdil
: M , Constable & Owen call: M dines.

29. F. Phaer, 1/2 B. IX. Call on Bramston , w. T Rd
, & on mrs Aldis , w.M J : Lambs sup.

30. Sa.
M calls: call, w. him, on Place
: H Robinson au soir. Old K John, acts 1, 2, 3. Hogan at tea.

May 1. Su. Old K John, fin. Owen breakfasts: call on Place
n : C M dines: sup at Kenney’s , w. M J & C C; adv. Clarkson
. Call on Lamb
.

2. M. Send to Ballachey, Pike & Davison : call on Place
n : M & Hogan call.

3. Tu. Write to Shelley . Call on Place
,
Hogan
&
Jo G
: M on Ballachey : M & A Curran dine: seek B M .

4. W. Send to Macmillan & Rodd . Call on Davison
,
Hume
&
Place
: write to Hamilton & Moore : Constable, Fleming & A Curran dine; invités Wolcot, Kenney, & Owen & M
.

5. Th. Call on Constable (Belisarius), w. M, M J, F, M & J; adv. Fleming
: & on Ballachey
: Shelley dines.

6. F.
M from Teasdale
: call on Mackintosh
na : meet A C : S E dines: Shelley calls.

7. Sa.
Gill calls: call on Mackintosh
: M from Teasdale
{.} Deliquium.

May 8. Su. Call on Aldis , w. C C; adv. mrs Slater
: call on Waldron
.

9. M.
Call on Davison (£150) , &, w. A C, on Constable
: Exhibition, w. A C
: Hogan calls: call on Hendrie , w. M J . adv. Wilkie .
10. Tu. Write to Shelley . C C to Teasdale : A C , Constable , Gill & Jas Smith na call. Deliquium.

11. W. Write to Shelley . M to Nash & Burton : call, w. do , on Place
: Owen , Graham , Hogan call: H Robinson sups. Deliquia duo. Dowlings call na . Letter from Lady Mackintosh . Dissolution of Cortes.
M dines .

12. Th.
M to Pike, Heaton & Teasdale : M dines: A & S Taylor at tea; adv. Owen ; invited, but postpond, Aldises, & W & A Curran
. Deliquia tria; multa imperfecta .

13. F.
C C to Teasdale twice: Shelley calls: Graham of Glasgow sups. Write to Lady Mackintosh .

14. Sa.
M to Teasdale, Ballachey & Burton : Owen calls; Hogan & Graham na . Calamities of Authors, p. 230.
May 15. Su. Calamities of Authors, p. 324; Vol. II, p. 160.
16. M. Calamities, p. 333. M to Teasdale : Hogan at tea.
17. Tu. Esprit, çala. Write to Hamond .

18. W.
Shelley & Pilcher calln , & P Smith na : M to Teasdale : meet Lamb . Write to Murray . Varillas, De Croy, p. 56.

19. Th.
M to Teasdale & Burton : call on Place
: M dines: theatre, Othello; adv. Ward, Middleton, H & A Robinson, R Sharp & Boddington
.

20. F.
Shelley calls; walk : A C calls. Carrizales, pp 55.

21. Sa. Massinger, Preface. Call on Murray
: M calls. Owen at tea.
May 22. Su. City Madam; Bondman, acts 1, 2, 3. Pilcher sups. Write to Constable .

23. M. Bondman, acts 4, 5: Toland, Druids, p. 20. Shelley , T Faulder n , S E & mrs Fairfield call: message from T D . F for Pentredevy
. Sup at Lb’s , w. M J . E Napier calls.
24. Tu. Roman Actor: G Fletcher, Russia; p. 52. Chamberlaine calls: Hogan sups.

25. W. Very Woman.
Burton promises a discount . M calls.

26. Th. Call on Hayward w. Shelley , &
Ballachey w. M : M from Teasdale
: Letterman calls, T Faulder & Hayward , Owen & Hogan n : meet T Davison : //
Shelley dines. Bardouc, p. 60.

27. F. Fatal Dowry, act 1: Bardouc, p. 96. Call on Hayward , w. Shelley , & on Burton
: mrs Topping dines.
28. Sa. Fatal Dowry, act 2: Bardouc, p. 136. Owen , M & Gill call.

May 29. Su. Notes on Bonaparte. Fatal Dowry, fin. Dine at Kenney’s , w. Poole & Terry; adv. M Burney, H Robinson & Amyot
. Write to Constable .

30. M. Write to Shelley . Maid of Honour, acts 1 & 2. Call on Teasdale
&
Saunders
. Peace.

31. Tu. Write to Brooks . Call on Place , w. C C; adv. Lambert & Owen
: Owen & R Taylor call: sup at
S E’s , w.M J, M & J.

June 1. W. Write to Shelley . S E ,
M
,
Macmillan
&
Letterman call: call on Saunders
&
Letterman
.

2. Th.
M from Hill , Sturch , R Sharp & Vaughan
: seek Wordsworth & H Robinson : call on N G
,
Jas White
&
Place
: Shelley calls: meet Hill .

3. F. Send thrice to Place , & call thrice
: call on Hume
. M from Burton
: write to Teasdale .

4. Sa. Send to Place : M from Burton
: write to Shelley . Call on Ballachey
.
June 5. Su. Bonaparte, çala. Jo G , R Taylor & Grattan call.

6. M. Robinson Suisse, Vol. I. Call on
Ballachey
&
Teasdale
: A Curran at tea. Gill calls.
7. Tu. Rob. Suisse, p. 40, Vol. II. Call on Ballachey twice: Shelley dines: Hamilton & M call: meet Jo G .

8. W. R Suisse, p. 110. C C from Ballachey
: Shelley & Hogg call:
Robert Baxter breakfasts & dines . Alfred Mills calls.

9. Th. R Suisse, p. 152. Call on
Ballachey twice: wrte to Burton : M dines; adv. Hogan
: R Baxter at tea. A Mills calls. Illuminations, 3 nights.

10. F. Write to Shelley & Patrickson . R Suisse, p. 233, fin. Call on Ballachey twice & on Place
: R Baxter dines. &
Hayward
.

11. Sa. Call on Richards
,
Place
,
Perry
,
Dawe
&
B Montagu (the 2 last w. Place) &
Murray
: Mills applies to W Allen .
June 12. Su. Maid of Honour, acts 1, 2, 3: Plutrch, Camillus, pp. 23.

13. M. Write to Taylor, Norwich , & Shelley . Cordila, 8 pp. Call on
Ballachey
&
Hume
: Hogan , M , Corbould & A Mills call.

14. Tu. Mirror, Sackville, pp. 39. Call on Ballachey twice, Saunders’s clerk &
Hayward
: W & A Curran call, & Pilcher : meet S E .

15. W. Gorboduc. Call on Ballachey
&
Saunders
n twice: Corbould calls, mrs Dowling & Hogan .

16. Th. Maid of Honour, fin. B Montagu calls: call on Springsguth
&
Saunders
: M dines.

17. F. Renegado, act 1: Temple, Heroic Virtue, p. 36. Call on Saunders
,
Springal
&
Hayward
: Hogan calls.

18. Sa. Temple, p. 155. Call on Ballachey
,
Waugh
&
Saunders
: Dadley calls: Shelley, at Hookham’s, w. C C .

June 19. Su. Plutarch, Coriolanus, p. 8: Temple, on Poetry, pp. 63. Call on Hayward
: Shelley & Curran dine.

20. M. Temple, on the Gout, pp. 48. Call on
Ballachey
&
Waugh
n : Shelley dines: A Curran at tea.
21. Tu. Temple on Learning, pp. 72. Call on Ballachey 3 times, Dadley , E F , M & Hogan call: Shelley dines.

22. W. Call on Ballachey 3 times, & on Waugh
: M calls: Shelley dines: Curran at tea.

23. Th. Call on Ballachey
&
Waugh
: Shelley , Hogan & G White call: dine at Curran’s , w. G Cockburn .

24. F. Call on Ballachey 3 times , &
Waugh
n : C C from Saunders’s
: Shelley dines; adv. S & A Taylor
. Call on Knowles
&
Hume
. Hogan calls n .

25. Sa. Call on Ballachey
,
Waugh
,
Nash
n &
Burton
n : Shelley dines; adv. A Curran
.

June 26. Su. Defence of Poesie, pp. 106. Call on
Place
&
Hayward , w. Shelley : Shelley dines: tea
A Curran’s , w. W C, M J & C C .

27. M. Virgin Martyr, act 1. Call on
Ballachey
, (w. Shelley) Burton
,
Waugh
& Morgan Equitable : M calls: Shelley dines.

28. Tu. Write to Fanny . M from Nash
: sup at Kenney’s , w. M J & Adelaide; adv. Mercier, mrs Dowling & miss Lanes
. Shelley dines.

29. W. Call on Hookham
&
Place , w. Shelley ; & on Macmillan
&
Lamb ; adv. E F
: Shelley dines; adv. Hookham
. meet Curran .

30. Th. Call on Ballachey
&
Waugh ; adv. Shelley, M & 2 Nashes : A Curran at tea .

July 1. F.
London Assurance , w. Shelley : call on Hume
,
Macmillan
n ,
Place
, &
S.
on Hookham
.

2. Sa. Call, w. Shelley, on Nash
& Ballachey ; signature {.} Place calls n .

July 3. Su. Walk, w. Shelley, & C C ; call on E Hookham
; meet Gen. White .

4. M. Call on Place
: Shelley dines; adv. E F
: Bail, Serjeants’ Inn .

5. Tu. Call on Place
: meet Lambert & Perry : Curran dines; adv. Shelley
.

6. W.
Transaction of Mar. 4 completed . Curran calls: E F, Patrickson, & Shelley & M dine; adv.O F
: walk w. Shelley, Spa Fields, &
Hookham’s
. H Robinson au soir. Hogan calls.

7. Th.
M & Shelley from Nash
: walk, w. Shelley, to Bond Street .

8. F. Talk with Mary: letter . Write to Shelley . Mt Burton : Patrickson dines; adv. Curran
. Hogan calls.
9. Sa. Write to Shelley, 3 pp. Davison calls. W from school, 3 weeks.

July 10. Su.
P B S, p. 10/2. Ludolphus, çala. Call on Place
.

11. M.
P B S, p. 10. Drapers’ Hall Gardens, w. Shelley : call, w. do , on Burton
,—& on Ballachey
.

12. Tu.
M breakfasts: M & Shelley from Nash
: call on Hume
, & (w. Shelley) on Ballachey
& Burton
: Drapers’ Gardens: Mercier, Adelaide, Kenneys, Dowlings & F Ht dine; adv. Gen. White
.

13. W. Call on Burton
: Drapers’ Gardens: Patrickson dines: adv
A Curran calls.

14. Th. Sejanus, act 1. Meet Shelley : Patrickson dines; adv. M & W Curran
. Write to H M Williams & Gisbrne
. H S in town.

15. F.
M & Shelley fr. Nash
: Balloon : P B & H Shelley calln : M & F Jones call, for Miss White
: call on H Shelley
.

16. Sa.
C Turner (fr. Mackintosh ) & Dadley call: call on Shelleys
; coach, w. P B S .
July 17. Su. R & N Authors, çala. Patrickson dines. Invited to Kenney’s , w. Wroughtons, Young, Bateman .

18. M.
H Boinville & E F call: walk w. Shelley : Patrickson sups.

19. Tu.
M breakfasts; fr. Nash , fin . Call on Rodd
: sup at S E’s , w. M J & M .

20. W. Write to Lambert . Digby’s Letters, p. 37. Call on mrs Aldis
: E F & S Taylor call.

21. Th. Write to T T . Peter Smith calls: call on King
: meet Phillips : Delvalle calls.

22. F. Talk with Jane ; letter fr. do . Call on Evans
: S E dines. Write to H S .
23. Sa. Write J King . Seneca, Thebais, act 1. M & L K call: meet B M : Hogan calls n : R Morrel dines.

July 24. Su. Turberville, Mornay,Harington, çala. C C fr. Place
: walk, w. M J, St Jas Park .
25. M. Write to Shelley . P Thebais, act 2: Plato Red., p. 78. E F calls.

26. Tu. Thebais, act 3: Plato Redivivus, p. 252.
Rt Morrel dines; adv. Hogan; sups
.
27. W. Thebais, act 4: Plato Red., p. 293, fin. Mrs Topping at tea.
28. Th. Five in the morning. Macmillan calls. M J for Dover .

29. F.
M & Kemp call: call on Rodd
n . Write to M J , & C C
// to Fanny .

30. Sa. Write to M J & Patrickson . Call on Kemp
&
S E , w. C C : Hogan sups. Virgin Martyr, act 1: Loor’s Pilgrimage, act 1.
Macmillan calls. Prorogation.
July 31. Su. Agamemnon, acts 1 & 2. St James’s, w. C C . M J returns.
Aug. 1. M. Write to H Boinville . Virgin Martyr, act 2. St James’s Park, w. C C .
2. Tu. Write to Constable . Virgin Martyr, fin. Kemp calls.
3. W. Love’s Pilgrimage, acts 1, 2, 3. Kemp & Hume call.

4. Th. Write to H Boinville . Much Ado about Nothing. Call on Davison
: Toppings dine: Patrickson sups.
5. F. Love’s Labour Lost. M & Chamberlaine call.
6. Sa. Shakespear, Sonnets, 26. Toppings dine: Kemp calls.
Aug. 7. Su. Midsummer Night’s Dream, act 1: Love’s Pilgrimage, acts 4 & 5. C Mountcashel & L K call: L K at tea. Patrickson dines.

8. M. Midsummer Night, act 2. Patrickson dines: L K & L Kenney at tea. Call on Hume
.

9. Tu. Write to Hogan . Call on Place
: Flather calls: Hume dines; adv. E Topping
.

10. W. Write to Jane , & E Topping . Kenney dines: call on
Place
. M calls. W elopes, 2 nights.
Patrickson dies.

11. Th. Seek Davison : call on Mayhew
,
Miss Smith
&
Hogan
n : meet M & Knapp, St J Park : Hume , & Hogan call. Write to Pemberton .

12. F. Write to Constable , Davison & Pemberton . Call on Hume
.

13. Sa. Midsummer Night, fin. Call on Hume
: Hume , Hayward & L Knapp call.
Aug. 14. Su. Write to H Boinville . Shakespear, Sonnets, 42: Merchant of Venice, act 1. Sup at Kenney’s , w. Lambs . Haswel calls.

15. M. S Sonnets, 60. Call on Hume
: theatre, w. C C; Stoops to Conquer, & Hocus Pocus.

16. Tu. Call on Hume
&
Place
: Kenney dines; adv. L Kenney
: Fanny arrives. Call on Knowles
&
Pearce
.

17. W. Shylock, act 2. Call on Pearce
&
Hume
: Kenney dines: Dawe & M call.

18. Th. S Sonnets, 80. Shylock, act 3. Call on Place
: theatre, Frederic the Great, & Harlequin Hoax.

19. F. S Sonnets, 90: Shylock, fin.
Kenney calls: call on Lett ,
Macmillan
&
Hume
: send to Rodd . Dermony calls: call on
H Shelley
: Lambs sup. Rutt calls.

20. Sa. Write to Lambert & W Miller . S Sonnets, 103. Call on
Hayward
&
Place
: Hogarth Exhibition; adv. D’Arblays, M Burney, Lambs, Taylors & Foote
. Fawn, act 1: Christian Morals.
Aug. 21. Su. Letter to J Taylor, p. 4/2. Gentlemen of Verona: Selden, Table-Talk, çala. Dawe calls: Darmony dines. Wiat, Epistles.

22. M. S Sonnets, 126: As You Like It, act 1. Haswel calls: call on Place
.

23. Tu. Call on Burney
& M Jones, Greenwich
: meet Hayward , Hume & Chamberlaine : L Kenney calls.
24. W. Write to Pemberton . Hogan sups.

25. Th. S Sonnets, 136. Call on L Knapp
: meet Kenney {:} Hume calls & Hayward : sup at Lambs , w. M J, C C, White E I H & Dyer; adv. M Burney
.

26. F. Lover’s Complaint. Hayward calls: call on Hume
&
Place
: theatre, Love & Gout. Seek Russell & Watkn
.

27. Sa. Write to Taylor; Norwich
. S Sonnets, 146. Hayward , J & W Stone call, & Stevenson beggar : call on Rodd
.

Aug. 28. Su. S Sonnets, 154, fin. Greenwich Chapel: call on Burney
&
Place ; adv. Hayward & C C
.

29. M. Agamemnon, act 3: Hayward & M n call: M Jones dines: call on
Place
: Curran at tea.

30. Tu.
Hayward & J Stone call: call on
Curran
: Curran dines.

31. W.
S E calls: Curran at tea. As You Like It, act 2.

Sep. 1. Th. Write to Place . As You Like It, acts 3, 4. Curran calls: dine, w.
him , Leicester Square . Stone surgeon calls.

2. F. Write to Place . As You Like It, fin. Mayhew , Walter Miller Junr
& Stone surgeon n calls: call on Knowles
&
Hume
: tea w. Curran , Leicester Sqre
.

3. Sa. Write to Place . Measure for Measure, acts 1, 2, 3. Walter Miller Junr
& Stone surgeon , M & Knapp call: Greenwich, w. W & C C ; call on M Jones
&
Lobrt
. Write to Taylor, Norwich
, & Miller, Perth
.
Sep. 4. Su. Stock, w. C C . Sup at S E’s , w. Hamiltons, miss Burrel, M J & C C .
5. M. Seek Curran : W Stone calls. Write to L Knapp . Measure for Measure, fin.

6. Tu.
J & W Stone , & Hayward call: S E dines. Court of Spain, p. 32.
7. W. Montaigne, p. 147 to 212: Court of Spain, p. 126. J Stone & Hayward call.
8. Th. Astrophel, çala. J Stone , Smith ami & M Lamb call: L Kenney au soir. Agamemnon, fin.
9. F. Write to Burney . Astrophel, p. 7: Languet, p. 22. Smith (New Inn) breakfasts: Hume & J Stone call.
10. Sa. Astrophel, p. 14: Languet, p. 42. Smith (New Inn) au soir.

Sep. 11. Su. Write to Place . Astrophel, p. 22. Hayward calls: dine at
L Kenney’s , w. Lambs, Pinkerton jr , M Betham, Ad. Mercier & M J .

12. M. Astrophel, p. 32. J & W Stone , & Watts call: call on Hayward
. Write to J Stone .
13. Tu. Astrophel, p. 44: Recluse, B. I, II. Bridger, calls. Write to J Stone .
14. W. Astrophel, p. 51, fin: Recluse, B. III, IV. Jefferies calls.

15. Th. Astrophel, p. 9: Languet, p. 57. C C from Miles
. Write to J Stone, contract . Hayward calls.

16. F. Astrophel, p. 22. Call on Miles
,
Law
n ,
Gwennap
&
Rodd
: Hume n , M Burney n & W C Brownna call . Letter from Shelley, Margaret Street
.

17. Sa. Astrophel, p. 32. Thos
& W Stone call. Surrey, çala.

Sep. 18. Su. Astrophel, p. 44. Stock, w. M J & C C . L Kenney, fille
& Ad. Mercier dine.
19. M. Astrophel, p. 51, fin. Write to J Stone . Hayward calls. Faithful Shepherdess, act 1.

20. Tu. Sidney, Sonnets, &c, p. 8: Shakespear, Ovid, p. 10. J Stone , & Smith (New Inn) call: call on Law
:
Whitaker calls.
21. W. Write to J Stone . Hayward & M call.

22. Th.
P S to Stone
. Twelfth Night, act 1. Call on Hume
: sup at L Kenney’s , w. M J, Jacksons & F Ht & C C : call on S E
. Write to P B S .

23. F. Twelfth Night, fin. Hayward & L K call: call on
Rodd
.
24. Sa. Letter to Stone . C C from Whitaker, &c : M calls.

Sep. 25. Su. Letter to Stone . Utopia, Ralph Robinson, çala. Call on Hayward
: L K au soir.

26. M. Write to J Stone . Call on Hume
&
Macmillan
.

27. Tu. Troilus, acts 1 & 2. Meet J Stone : L Knapp calls. Write to Luxford, Salisbury
.

28. W. Troilus, acts 3 & 4. C C from T Stone
: call on Hume
&
Mayhew
n .
29. Th. Troilus, act 5. Call on T Stone , w. C C : write to J Stone .

30. F. Antony, acts 1 & 2. Jas White & Clementi’s partner call: E Eastwick jr
& H Hopwood callna : call on Hayward
.

Oct. 1. Sa. Antony, act 3. Call on Martelli
: C C from Parker & Stevenson
: Say (from Slabrendorf ) & M call.

Oct. 2. Su. Write to Hogan . Lamb, Specimens, çala. Dine at
L K’s , w. F Pinkerton; adv & M J; adv. F Ht, Dowlings, miss Milner, F & C C
. C C from Place
.

3. M. Call on Richards
: seek Botwright , Murray & B M : F Pinkerton calls n : C C from A Robinson
; seeks Mullet .

4. Tu. Write to Davison . C C from Mullet
: seek Valpy & Gillies : call on Hayward
, &
Hume
&
Knowles
: M J from Simpson
.
Pratt dies.

5. W. Call on Hollier
,
Vale
&
Abud
, refiners,
Arden
, Hayward &
Clinton
: M J from Simpson
: C C from Hardwick & Hume
: Mrs Hayward callsna : meet Lambs .

6. Th. Call on Thelwal
: Hayward calls thrice: Thomson of Newburgh sups. Write to Thelwal .
7. F. Colin Clouts Come Home Again. W Curran , Say & Hayward call. Letter to Constable : write to Lambs .

8. Sa. Spenser, çala. C C from Sabine
: J Goodwin calls. Write to Hogan .
Oct. 9. Su. Virgil’s Gnat: Malone’s Supplemt, 1780, çala.

10. M. Hymn to Love. Write to Sabine . Theatre, 2/3 Romeo. Call on Hayward
: C C from Rickman , Martelli & Jas White
.

11. Tu. Hymn to Beauty. Hume & M call: call on Vale
: Lambs sup.

12. W. Write to Hogan . Tears of the Muses. Call on
Hayward
&
Vale
.

13. Th. 1/2 Mother Hubberd. M calls from Jane
: call on Vale , 3 times: S E dines.

14. F. Mother Hubberd, fin. Call on Vale
&
Hogan
: H Robinson calls n .

15. Sa. Write to Jane , A B & Latouch . Ruins of Rome. Christ Rejected, w. M J . Constable callsn . C C writes to Ings, Salisbury
.
Oct. 16. Su. Eldred: Churchyard, Shore’s Wife & Wolsey.

17. M. Write to Hume . Antony, act 4. M J from Hammersmith
.
18. Tu. Write to Thelwal . Antony, act 5.
19. W. Astrophel, p. 7: Languet, p. 70. L Knapp calls: call on M , w. C C .

20. Th. Eldred, acts 1, 2, 3; notes. Astrophel, p. 16: Languet, p. 83. Peacock calls: call on Hayward
.

21. F. Eldred, 1/2 act 4. Astrophel, p. 22. Hume , M & Macmillan call: call on L Knapp
n .

22. Sa. Letter to W Miller , Astrophel, p. 30. Thos Wilkie calls: call on Constable
n ,
Hogan
, &
Hayward
n .

Oct. 23. Su. Eldred, fin. Astrophel, p. 40: Milton, Divorce, & Defensio, çala. Call on L Knapp &
M
: Hayward calls.
24. M. Astrophel, p. 51, fin: Languet, p. 87: Romeo, act 1. Ings , L K , L Knapp , & M (from Hookhams ) & Tahourdin call: M dines.

25. Tu. Vertot, Bretons, p. 80: Romeo, act 1 & 2. Ings & Tho. Wilkie call: F from Jane
.

26. W. Hymn of Love: Dennis, çala. Ings calls: call on Thelwal
.

27. Th. Hymn of Beauty: Romeo, act 3.
Ings , Wilkie , Ings, Constable & Jas White call:
C C from Hogan
.

28. F. Deliquium. Hayward calls: call on Hume
: C C from Hogan & Place
.

29. Sa. Wilson, Rhetorike, çala: Burton, çala. Thos Wilkie calls: C C from Longman
.
Oct. 30. Su. Boiatuau, çala: Romeo, acts 4, 5: Montaigne, p. 213-234.

31. M. Spenser, Sonnets 40: Brantome, Borgia, pp. 4 20. Call on Knowles
, & w. C C, on Longman
& Jo G
: M dines .

Nov. 1. Tu. Hamlet, act 1: Walsingham’s Manual, p. 20. C C from Parker & Whitaker
: Lambs & M Burney sup.

2. W. Walsingham, p. 57. Letter from W Miller, Perth
. Hume , L Kenney & Tahourdin call: C C from Parker & Davison
: dine at S E’s , w. M J & E Oak; Thomas ausoir {.} H Robinson calls n .

3. Th. Write to D Stewart . C C from Davison , Curtis & Whitaker
: Keir at tea.
seeks D Stewart
.

4. F.
C C from Keir , D Stewart & B Montagu
: Winstanley, auctioneer, calls: call on Hayward
. Suetonius, J C, §. 1-8: Walsingham, p. 80.

5. Sa. Write to B Montagu . C C from B M , Curtis & Fourdrinier
: B Mo . & T Hookham call. Walsingham, p. 94.
Nov. 6. Su. Sejanus. Meet B M, w. M J .

7. M. Volpone, act 1: New Inn, acts 1& 2. Westminster-Hall, w. E Hookham : call on La Mackintosh
,
Lamb
&
Hayward
: M calls: C C from Whitaker , Miles & Hogan
: meet P B S .

8. Tu. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. Volpone, act 2. Call on Hume : Kenneys & S E dine: H Robinson sups.
9. W. Volpone, fin. Hume calls.

10. Th. Catiline, acts 1, 2, 3. Wal Miller jr calls: call on Hayward
: C C from Whitaker
:
theatre, w. M J & F, Macbeth; adv. Hewlet, L Knapp, A Pe & Hayward
. Aldis calls.

11. F. Catiline, act 4. Write for Mt Jones . T T , Hume & Mt Jones call: call on Knowles
: W Miller jr dines. Write to T T .

12. Sa. Catiline, act 5: Otway, çala.
T T sups.

Nov. 13. Su. Rochester, Letters. Jane at home:
Willm au soir; sleeps . 2 days .

14. M. Write to Taylor, Norwich
. Otway & Shadwel. Call on Rodd ; adv. Heber & Lowndes jr
: Corbould calls.

15. Th. Letter to Owen . Spenser, Sonnets, fin. Theatre, 1/4 Overreach, & John of Paris. Call on Whitaker
.
16. W. Philipses, revise. Spenser, idem.

17. Th. Philipses, revise. Spenser, Epithalamion. Vision of St Jerome, w. M J & F
: tea La Mackintosh’s , w. Wishaw .

18. F. Preface, p. 2.
Genn’s , w. Hayward, M J & C C .
19. Sa. Philipses, revise. Sup at Lamb’s , w. M J . Hayward calls. Daniel, Sonnets 23.
Nov. 20. Su. Sidney, Letter to Eliz; Dennis, çala. Philipses, 2 pp.

21. M. Philipses, revise. Dennis, çala. L Knapp calls: call on Rodd
.

22. Tu. Preface, 1 page. Write to Owen . T T , Hayward , Benbord & Kenney call: L K dines. C C from Parker & Gardner
. Sixfold Politician, p. 68.

23. W. Write to Hamilton . Daniel, Sonnets, fin. Call on Valpy
&
L Knapp
: seek Botwright : sup at S E’s , w. M J . talk w. C C on P B S
.
24. Th. Sixfold Politician, p. 118. L K dines: Hume calls.

25. F. Sixfold Politician, p. 186. Call on
Botwright
: Hayward & Clarkson call.

26. Sa. Albion’s England, c. 61. Call on Silver
: H R sups.

Nov. 27. Su. Albion’s England, c. 42, 63, 65: Post-nati, p. 18. Meet B Montagu : 3 Kenneys dine; adv. H Robinson
. C C from Botwright
.
28. M. Call on B Montagu twice : seek Hill : letter fr. Hamilton : theatre, 1/2 Isabella.

29. Tu. Warner, Prose Æneis, p. 11. B Montagu , M & H Robinson call: B Museum, for Dennis : call on L K
. Phaer, B. IX, fin.

30. W.
B Montagu & L Knapp n call: B Museum : call on Haselwood
,
Hayward
&
Pinkerton
: Jas White , C Mercier & Walthausens call.
Charles S born.

Dec. 1. Th. Warner, c. 67, 69, 71. C Mercier & Jas White call: tea Kenney’s
: write to B Montagu, on Walthausen
, & to Bindley . Hume calls, & W Wilson : call on Huggins, Xt’s Hospital
.

2. F.
F from B Montagu
: C C from Lambert
. Call on Longdill
: L K & C Mercier call.

3. Sa.
B Montagu & Margarot call.

Dec. 4. Su. Write to Botwright & B Montagu . Call on Hayward
. talk, w. C C, of V H, &c.

5. M.
Botwright calls.

6. Tu. Call on Hill
: C C from Stevens
. Nash, çala.

7. W. Call on Murray
na &
Hayward
: C C from Stevens , Hume & Lambert
.

8. Th.
B Museum, Gabr. Harvey . C C from Lambert . & Martelli
. Dyer calls.

9. F.
B Museum, do
. Call on Hayward
.

10. Sa. Write to Disney . Harrington, Ariosto, st. 31: Ritson, Bibl., çala. Botwright & Dyer call: C C from Bloxam
.
Dec. 11. Su. Bacon, Apophthegms. Sup at Aldis’s , w. M J & Woodifield . Disclosure.

12. M. Call on W Vaughan
,
S West
,
Murray
&
Poole
.
13. Tu. Harrington, C. I. Hayward calls: L Knapp at tea: H Robinson sups.

14. W. Harrington, C. II. Call on mrs Cl Smith
&
Northcote
: dine at Poole’s , w. Kenney : theatre; adv. Reynds
. Walsh & Nisbet, sale .
15. Th. Knight of Malta, acts 1 & 2. B Museum, G Harvey & Spenser : sup at S E’s , w. M J .
16. F. Knight of Malta, fin. Hume calls.

17. Sa. Harrington, C. III. Call on Murray
n : C C from Silver
: theatre, King & Duke.

Dec. 18. Su. Harrington, C. IV, V, VI: Daniel, Cleopatra, act 1. Call on Northcote
.

19. M. Harrington, C. VII, VIII. Museum, G Harvey . Call on Murray
.

20. Tu. Harrington, C. IX. Museum, G Harvey . Call on Devonshire
.

21. W. Harrington, C. X. R Taylor calls: call on Poole
.
22. Th. Harrington, C. XI, XII: Montaigne, p. 247 to 304.

23. F. Write to Murray . Harrington, C. XIII. St Brides; adv. Blacket : call on Lamb
n : Say calls, ppc na .

24. Sa. Write to Miller, Perth
. Lamb calls: C C from Cooper & Williams
: Say calls na . Peace with America .
Dec. 25. Su. Harrington, C. XIV: L Brooke to a Lady, pp. 38.
26. M. Harrington, C. XV: Languet, p. 95. M calls.
27. Tu. Harrington, C. XVI: Spenser, Letters. Clerk from Ralph Price calls.

28. W. Spenser, Latinè.
Theatre, Venice Preserved; w. M J, F & W.
29. Th. Write to Murray . Robert Cary, p. 52.
30. F. Philipses, revise. Harrington, C. XVII. Aldis calls.

31. Sa. Cary, p. 160. Merry (to distrain) &
Chamberle call: call on C Mackintosh
,
Lamb
n &
H Robinson
n . C C from Smirke
.
